oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tennessee State Guard soldiers charging across field with rifles at Clarksville Armory maneuvers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Members of the 2nd Battalion/ 2nd Infantry of the Tennessee State Guard perform maneuvers at the Armory in Clarksville.

Demonstrations on riot control, chemicals, new bayonet drills, and extended order drills were included in the maneuvers. A barbecue financed by members of the State Guard followed the military program.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tennessee State Guard, 1941-1947
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tennessee. Militia; Tennessee - History, Military; World War, 1939-1945
Armories; Military facilities; Military maneuvers; Firearms; Militias; Military training; Rifles
